alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 5:39AM MST until January 02 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed rain and snow. Localized areas of freezing rain possible this morning. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Basin. * WHEN...Until noon MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
